module.name: Custom Applications
module.description: Registry to add custom extensions and destinations that may be created and used so that the Extensions and Destinations Registry can include these.
module.changelog: *15.0.14* Packaging of ver 15.0.14 *15.0.13* Related to FREEPBX-20414: removed $jobid from runRestore() *15.0.12* FREEPBX-19896 Editing a Custom Destinations entry is creating the duplicate entry. *15.0.11* Fixing FREEPBX-17867 *15.0.10* Fixing legacy restore *15.0.9* Fixing legacy restore *15.0.8* Fixing legacy restore *15.0.7* backup and restore *15.0.6* FREEPBX-18915 After editing a Custom Extension entry, page is not redirecting to list Custom Extensions page *15.0.5* Add backup and restore *15.0.4* FREEPBX-18354 Fix parameter name *15.0.3* Fixing FREEPBX-15555 Exception Asterisk is not connected error *15.0.2* Packaging of ver 15.0.2 *15.0.1* Backup 15
